title: Miracle of the mountains
creator_credit: Fortitude Productions, Bob Blasdal, John Schindler and Dick Marks
brief_description: Working on no more than a bushman’s intuition Bernard O’Reilly battled for days over miles of dense and seemingly impenetrable rainforest to try and locate a downed Stinson airliner. After a two day battle with the elements he not only located the crashed Stinson but assisted in carrying out two of the survivors. Narrated by John Schindler.
